20-035EC.summary: Recommendation to conduct a study session to interview and evaluate applicants from Council Districts 7, 8 and 9 for the Independent Redistricting Commission, with final recommendations to be presented at the October 14, 2020 meeting of the Ethics Commission.Page 1 of 7TELECONFERENCE, 2:00 PMFRIDAY, OCTOBER 9, 2020CITY OF LONG BEACHETHICS COMMISSION MINUTESChair Wise spoke.Darlene Castillo spoke.Frank Gutierrez spoke.Darlene Oliver spoke.Zhelinrentice Scott spoke.Chair Wise declared a recess at 2:32 p.m.Chair Wise called the meeting back to order at 2:46 p.m.Chair Wise spoke.Michele Anderson spoke.Martha Duncan spoke.Marissa Martinez spoke.Melody Osuna spoke.Gayleah Richmond spoke.Chair Wise declared a recess at 3:11 p.m.Chair Wise called the meeting back to order at 3:31 p.m.Chair Wise spoke.Tiffany Briggs spoke.This EC-Agenda Item was received and filed.REGULAR AGENDA  (3:40 PM)2.

and presented the staff report.Chair Wise spoke.Commissioner PollackJonathan Nagayama, City Clerk Analyst, spoke.Commissioner Shotwell spoke.Vice Chair Morales spoke.Chair Wise spoke.Commissioner Pollack spoke.Jonathan Nagayama, City Clerk Analyst, spoke.Chair Wise spoke.Jonathan Nagayama, City Clerk Analyst, spoke.Commissioner Shotwell spoke.Commissioner FiedlerJonathan Nagayama, City Clerk Analyst, spoke.A dialogue ensued between Commissioner Fiedler and Jonathan Nagayama, City Clerk Analyst.Vice Chair Morales spoke.Chair Wise spoke.Jonathan Nagayama, City Clerk Analyst, spoke.Page 3 of 7TELECONFERENCE, 2:00 PMFRIDAY, OCTOBER 9, 2020CITY OF LONG BEACHETHICS COMMISSION MINUTESCommissioner Shotwell spoke.Rebecca Garner, Administrative Deputy City Manager, spoke.Commissioner Fiedler spoke.Amy Webber, Deputy City Attorney, spoke.Jonathan Nagayama, City Clerk Analyst, spoke.Commissioner De Benedictis spoke.Chair Wise spoke.A discussion ensued between Chair Wise and Commissioner De Benedictis.Commissioner Maniquis spoke.Vice Chair Morales spoke.Chair Wise spoke.Rebecca Garner, Administrative Deputy City Manager, spoke.Vice Chair Morales spoke.Commissioner Pollack spoke.Chair Wise spoke.Commissioner Shotwell spoke.Jonathan Nagayama, City Clerk Analyst, spoke.Chair Wise spoke.Jonathan Nagayama, City Clerk Analyst, spoke.A dialogue ensued between Chair Wise and Jonathan Nagayama, City Clerk Analyst.Page 4 of 7TELECONFERENCE, 2:00 PMFRIDAY, OCTOBER 9, 2020CITY OF LONG BEACHETHICS COMMISSION MINUTESAmy Webber, Deputy City Attorney, spoke.Commissioner Shotwell spoke.Rebecca Garner, Administrative Deputy City Manager, spoke.A motion was made by Vice Chair Morales, seconded by Commissioner Pollack, to approve recommendation, as amended, to move forward with inviting the 11 candidates inadvertently omitted from the process to be interviewed, and notify the 11 candidates inadvertently included in the process that they would not be moving forward in the selection process.
